```{python}
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

# Create a test 10x3 dataframe
df = pd.DataFrame({
    "A": np.arange(1, 11),
    "B": np.random.randint(10, 100, size=10),
    "C": np.random.choice(["w", "x", "y", "z"], size=10)
})


print(df)

# Select rows subset
subset = df[df['C'] == 'w']

print("Subset has ", len(subset), "rows.")
```
